name: Murabaha: Cost Disclosure (Hard Gate)
description: HARD GATE: Full transparency requirement - institution must disclose actual acquisition cost and profit markup separately to customer before Murabaha sale

steps.title: Prepare Cost Breakdown Statement
steps.description: Document actual acquisition cost of commodity/asset with supporting purchase invoices

requiredEvidence.description: Original supplier invoice showing acquisition cost paid by institution
Proof of payment to supplier for asset acquisition
Any additional costs incurred (shipping, customs, storage) that are part of total cost

policyConstraints.constraint: All costs forming the acquisition price must be documented and disclosed

steps.title: Calculate and Document Profit Markup
steps.description: Calculate profit margin/markup according to institution's pricing policy and document separately from cost

requiredEvidence.description: Documented calculation showing profit percentage or amount added to cost
Reference to institution's approved pricing policy justifying the markup

policyConstraints.constraint: Profit markup must be clearly separated from cost and cannot be hidden or bundled

steps.title: Disclose Cost and Profit to Customer
steps.description: Provide customer with full disclosure document showing: (1) Acquisition cost, (2) Profit markup, (3) Total Murabaha sale price

requiredEvidence.description: Written disclosure showing cost breakdown, signed by customer acknowledging receipt
Customer's written confirmation that they understand the cost, profit, and total price
Proof that disclosure was provided before Murabaha sale contract was signed

policyConstraints.constraint: CRITICAL: Disclosure must occur BEFORE customer signs Murabaha sale contract
Customer has right to full transparency on pricing components

steps.title: Shariah Compliance Verification
steps.description: SCO verifies that cost disclosure requirement was met before Murabaha sale

requiredEvidence.description: SCO confirmation that disclosure occurred before sale contract
Timestamps showing: (1) Disclosure date < (2) Contract signing date

policyConstraints.constraint: Shariah Compliance Function must verify transparency requirement was met

criticalNote: ⚠️ HARD GATE: Without full cost disclosure before sale, the Murabaha transaction violates AAOIFI FAS-28 §3 transparency requirements. This is a Shariah non-compliance risk (SNCR).
